title: Cha Cha's South Indian Vegetarian
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Fast food, Take-out
description: Vegetarian South Indian kitchen with air conditioning, located in the Indian Emporium building on the 4th floor. Offers a large selection of South Indian food from dosas and idlli to vada, and samosas. Menu is in English and is approx. 90% vegan suitable with the exception of several marked dishes with dairy. There is a also pure Thai vegan food booth on the floor. Approx 10 minute walk up Chakra Phet Road from the Boat Pier.
